snippet: Former President George W. Bush’s book “41: A Portrait of My Father” could inspire historical reassessments of two former presidents.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush publishes book 41: A Portrait of My Father, unabashed love letter presenting former Pres George H W Bush in heroic terms; Bush says at event marking publication that he wrote book to help nudge along larger historical reassessment of his father's tenure.
lead_paragraph: Former President George W. Bush’s book “41: A Portrait of My Father” could inspire historical reassessments of two former presidents.

headline.main: Bush (43) Shares Spotlight With Bush (41) as Tribute Book Is Published
headline.print_headline: Bush (43) Shares Spotlight With Bush (41) as Tribute Book Is Published

keywords.value: Bush, George W, Presidential Library and Museum
keywords.name: organizations
